description: Adds one or more tags to an associated repository.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the RepositoryAssociation object. You can retrieve this ARN by calling ListRepositoryAssociations.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: An array of key-value pairs used to tag an associated repository. A tag is a custom attribute label with two parts: A tag key (for example, CostCenter, Environment, Project, or Secret). Tag keys are case sensitive. An optional field known as a tag value (for example, 111122223333, Production, or a team name). Omitting the tag value is the same as using an empty string. Like tag keys, tag values are case sensitive. (string) --- (string) ---
